item.title: Nodejs Deployment: Building and Configuring on Amazon Linux AMI
item.description: Logging in and updating system to latest SSH your shiny new VM, Now lets update the system to the latest: sudo yum update Install OS dependencies We’r going to build Node.js from sources, some dependencies (such as gcc) are required: sudo yum install gcc-c++ make openssl-devel git Cloning n Building Node.js cd git clone git://github.com/joyent/node.git cd node git checkout v0.10.13 #check for other stable tags by executing 'git tag' .
